import { React , useEffect, useState} from 'react'; const Lessons = () => { const [products, setproducts] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { fetch('https://onlineedu-dev-ed.my.salesforce.com/services/apexrest/Lesson') .then(res=>res.json()) .then(json=>{ console.log(json); setproducts(json); }); fetch('https://afternoon-dusk-68458.herokuapp.com/users') .then(res => console.log(res)) }, []) // https://fakestoreapi.com/products?limit=10 return (
{products ? products.map((item) => (
{item.category.slice(1, 10).toUpperCase()}

{item.description.slice(1, 50).toUpperCase()}

)) : 'Loading'}
) } export default Lessons
